mil3.4.8:1.5_1: ajjhattikabāhire āyatane abhinandanti abhivadanti ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti,
mil3.4.8:1.5_3: na parimuccanti jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokena paridevena dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi na parimuccanti dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
mil3.4.8:1.6_1: ariyasāvako ajjhattikabāhire āyatane nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati,
mil3.4.8:1.6_2: tassa taṁ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato taṇhā nirujjhati,
mil3.4.8:1.6_7: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti, evaṁ kho, mahārāja,
